response.overview: Joseph Brown (Dallos Paz) is a young aspiring filmmaker who lives with his Grandmother (Jean Keef). He mows lawns part time for small time businessman Bill Donahue (Kameron Primm). Bill always warns Joseph that if he'd put his filmmaking aside and focus on mowing lawns, Bill might get less complaints from his customers. When Bill's new employee Ralph (Mickey Reece) comes along and replaces Joseph, life for everyone becomes a little more complicated.
response.title: How Firm a Foundation
